Title: MRC ADORE LADIES WATCH MOTHER OF PEARL FACE DIAMOND IN BEZEL LUGS MSRP $14,300
Description: Presented here for sale is a very nice MRC - Manufacture Rodolphe Cattin- Adore Ladies's watch. This watch features: 1 Timezone Display Black MOP (Mother of Pearl) Dial214 Diamonds in Bezel and Lugs Total 0.96ct Alligator Strap Folding Buckle 34 mm MSRP on this watch is $14,300 Rodolphe Cattin was part the creative team for the Swatch Group (which is also known for major brands like Blancpain, Omega, Breguet, Rado, Longines etc.) and later on Rodolphe Cattin worked with Franck Muller for few years. Fast forward to December 2010, and Rodolphe Cattin launched his own brand, MRC (Manufacture Rodolphe Cattin). Rodolphe Cattin brought all his creativity and long time experience into his brand, MRC, and then imediately introduced a line-up of watches for men and women. For women, there are the Utopia and Adore collections with mother-of-pearl dials and ball-like designed lugs, bringing elegance to the pieces. The Utopia, like the Adore models, has a quartz movement and a polished square shaped case. The Adore timepieces have a sofa-shaped case. This watch is made in Switzerland.This watch is sold and shipped from an authorized retailer.
